WorkItem.Description:
I downloaded .16 and .19 and got this error message when attempting to run the program:
        To run this application, you first must install one of the following versions of the .NET Framework: v4.0
        Contact your application publisher for instructions about obtaining the approprieate version of the .NET Framework.
 
I am not computer savvy enough for this, so I am posting here for help.  I have tried the online version and have had difficulties and have posted about them also.  Thanx in advance for any Help.
 
Soltarnal -  US - Skullcrusher
